name: Elasticsearch status not green
description: Checks whether the Elasticsearch cluster status is ok

fields.name: content
fields.value:
1. Check the network connectivity between your application and Elasticsearch nodes.
 2. Ensure that the Elasticsearch version is up-to-date.
 3. Verify the file permissions for the Elasticsearch data directory.
 4. Restart the Elasticsearch service.
 5. If the problem persists, check the Elasticsearch logs for any error messages.

For more information on troubleshooting Elasticsearch issues, refer to the official Elasticsearch documentation: <https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/client/java-api/current/index.html>
